title: Elden Ring Gets Delayed - Kinda Funny Games Daily 10.18.21
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about a PACKED February 2022, DC Fandome reveals, and incoming Resident Evil news.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:30 - Housekeeping

PS I Love You XOXO is recording on Patreon in a few hours AND it’s gonna be a super special Reader Mail episode! So if you’re on Patreon, you can write-in with your PlayStation related questions for Janet and me to answer. That episode will be up for everyone to listen to Tuesday on youtube and podcast services around the globe.

Speaking of Youtube.com/Kindafunnygames: Episode 2 of The Arkham Files premieres today and it’s all about how Arkham City truly makes you feel like Batman. AND, to celebrate Arkham City’s 10th anniversary, Barrett and Mike are streaming the game all day, starting after Games Daily, right here on twitch.tv/kindafunnygames!

The Roper Report -
00:09:07 - Elden Ring gets delayed, February 2022 Gets Even Busier
00:28:21 - We got more Gotham Knights and Suicide Squad at DC Fandome!
00:41:56 - Ads 00:02:09 - Ad Length
00:44:08 - Capcom is Teasing Multiple ‘Resident Evil’ Announcements
00:49:29 - We Happy Few’s Studio Has Doubled in Size
00:54:45 - Out today
00:56:57 - You‘re Wrong
